name: HopDodge
storyline: Hop and Dodge start out in heaven, but after Hop hits a switch that turns off the floor, he falls into Hell where he learns that his only way back into heaven is to help Dodge with his quest to get back his bones.
summary: HopDodge is bringing back classic grid based platforming, with a new twist! Hop around on the back plane, and dodge spikes, wolves, and cannons in the foreground. Every level is built using an in-game editor, so players can create their own limitless content.
